title: Drawing, "Stylized Tulip Heads (pink and white)", ca. 1930
medium: Brush and gouache, graphite on paper, lined.
description: Stylized tulip heads outlined in white against shocking pink background. Lower-left corner shows design against black background.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Stylized Tulip Heads (pink and white)", ca. 1930.
ca. 1930. Brush and gouache, graphite on paper, lined.. Gift of Mr. Donald Cameron. 1992-51-71.
